title: Fuujin Monogatari (Windy Tales)
synopsis: Nao, an 8th grader, is one of the only two members of a Digital Camera Club, where she also serves as the manager. It's a mystery that she shoots nothing else but the skies and clouds. One day, she finds a cat on a rooftop where she usually shoots her camera. It's a cat that knows how to manipulate the flow of a wind. Shocked to find a strange animal, Nao loses her footing and falls off from the rooftop!
characters: ['Ueshima, Nao', 'Kataoka, Miki', 'Nomura, Jun', 'The Wind Cat', 'Karin', 'Yoshino, Ryouko', 'Makino-sensei', 'Yukio', 'Mr. Taiki', 'Atsuko']
